util

Class Adjustment

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.Adjustment
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NumberAdjustment

    public class Adjustment
extends Object
    Adjustment is a class for adjusting string representations of values within a String.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Adjustment(int width)
      Creates an adjustment.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String center(String s)
      Returns a centered String.
      String left(String s)
      Returns a left adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

      Returns a right adjusted String.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Adjustment

        public Adjustment(int width)
        Creates an adjustment.
        Parameters:
        width - is the number of positions for the result. If the width is insufficient extra positions are added.

    • Method Detail

      • center

        public String center(String s)
        Returns a centered String.
        Parameters:
        s - is the string to adjust.

      • left

        public String left(String s)
        Returns a left adjusted String.
        Parameters:
        s - is the string to adjust.

      • right

        public String right(boolean b)
        Returns a right adjusted String.
        Parameters:
        b - is the value to adjust.

        Returns a right adjusted String.

        c - is the value to adjust.
